page.title: 18EVENTS
page.content: The village hall is the centre of most social and money raising events. Regular whist drives and bingo are held;meetings for senior citizens, W.I.and British Legion.Discos and dances are sometimes held. The hall is also used for private functions such as wedding receptions.There are children's dancing classes and various leisure classes .Jumble sales, bazaars,coffee mornings and tea parties are held to raise money for various local and national charaties. The church and British Legion hold summer fetes in the Manor House garden,the school holds a fete each year. The County British Legion Parade is held in the village each year.The Young Farmers, the football club and the chapel also organise barn dances and various other activities.
